text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
At summer camp, Maruzensky and I<n>work hard to improve
her running<n>even further. Maruzensky is in high<n>spirits as
the sun rises on the final<n>day.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Good morning, Trainer. Come on! We<n>need our last day of
training to be a<n>good one!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Good morning, Trainer. Come on! We<n>need our last day of
training to be a<n>good one!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: This is it, you know? So let's rev up<n>and go!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
An invigorated Maruzensky pushes<n>through the final day of
training with<n>me.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Phew... Thanks, Trainer! Hehe, looks<n>like we both worked
up a sweat.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Phew... Thanks, Trainer! Hehe, looks<n>like we both worked
up a sweat.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Yeah! I'm exhausted, but like,<n>exhilarated at the same time.
I feel<n>fantastic!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
After all this training, I can't wait for<n>my next race. Hehe, I
think you'll<n>enjoy it.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
But hey... Are you all right? Aren't<n>you tired from being
under the sun for<n>so long?
choice_data_list: I'll be fine once I rest up.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
But hey... Are you all right? Aren't<n>you tired from being
under the sun for<n>so long?
choice_data_list: I'll be fine once I rest up.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: You sure? Don't overdo it, okay?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Well, I'm gonna head back and wash<n>up. It's important to
get plenty of rest<n>after a big workout!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I go back to my room and take a<n>relaxing bath. Afterwards, I
head<n>outside to get some cool night air...

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
I know what Trainer said, but we had<n>a really tiring day. I
hope I'm not being<n>selfish...

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: But...

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Ah, Trainer...

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Ah, Trainer...

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Um... I heard from another student that<n>there's a festival
going on at the<n>shrine near here.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: And...

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: All right, I'll just ask!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Wanna grab dinner at the food stalls<n>there?!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
There's supposed to be game stalls<n>too, and they're doing
a festival<n>dance! I bet we'd have a great time<n>together!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Ah, wonderful!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Okay! With that decided, I'm going to<n>dance my socks off at
the dance!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Come on, Trainer! This way!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Come on, Trainer! This way!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Wooow! It's so crowded, isn'tit? I really wanna check out this onestall, but I can't see it anywhere.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Hehehe. ♪ It isn't just any old stall.<n>Ready for this?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: It's a dessert shop, and it's fresh to<n>the max!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
All of the students are saying the<n>summer-only Deluxe
Carrot Tower<n>Parfaits are totally off the hook.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
I'm a little worried they'll sell out<n>since they're so popular,
but we<n>should save dessert for later.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: You know what we have to do first.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Da, da, dum, ba, ba, bum. ♪

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
There! The dance! Aw, this takes me<n>back... My family used
to dance all the<n>time when I was a kid.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Yeah, let's go! It's time to get our<n>groove on!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
We join the dance, and Maruzensky<n>performs beautifully.
Everyone there<n>is feeling the excitement.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Wooo! We're not done yet! Come on,<n>Trainer! Feeling
jiggy?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Wooo! We're not done yet! Come on,<n>Trainer! Feeling
jiggy?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As the event heats up even more, the<n>dance grows too big
to contain.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Ahhh! What fun! You dance pretty<n>well, Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Ahhh! What fun! You dance pretty<n>well, Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
It was! Everyone was really jamming<n>out! I got so carried
away I wound up<n>on the main platform. ♪

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
My whole body was rumbling from<n>standing next to the
taiko drums! It<n>was just the best!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
My mother always used to say,<n>"When you stand on the big
stage, it's<n>time to boogie down." Hehe, I guess<n>the apple
doesn't fall far from the<n>tree.
choice_data_list: Ah, so you got it from your mother...
Ah, so you got it from your mother...

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Hm? Did you say something?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Oh, right! We need to go get our<n>dessert!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Let's go find a Deluxe Carrot Tower<n>Parfait!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
We get our carrot parfaits and enjoy<n>the other stalls. After
seeing all there<n>is to see, it's time to head back.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
That parfait was fabulous! It even had<n>ice cream between
the macarons... My<n>heart's as full as my stomach. ♪

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
I got to run along the ocean, join the<n>festival dance, and eat
a rad new<n>dessert...

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
I never thought I'd get to spend such<n>a good time with
someone.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Hehe, it was so much fun.Promise we can do it again sometime?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Are you sure you don't need to think<n>about it more?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Are you sure you don't need to think<n>about it more?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
If you say yes to everything, who<n>knows where my whims
will take you<n>next?
choice_data_list: Whatever it is, bring it on!
Whatever it is, bring it on!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, please, I know you're tired...<n>But that's right! We
should plan our<n>next outing!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
...It's really weird though. I feel like I<n>can be myself with
you, even more<n>than when I'm alone.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
...It's really weird though. I feel like I<n>can be myself with
you, even more<n>than when I'm alone.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Like I can go anywhere, run however<n>far—anything. That's
how you make<n>me feel, Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Like I can go anywhere, run however<n>far—anything. That's
how you make<n>me feel, Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
I don't know how you do it... You<n>really are something
special!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
I don't know how you do it... You<n>really are something
special!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Wow! I guess we're a good match,<n>huh? ♪

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
It's kind of embarrassing to say this,<n>but... I hope we get to
keep sharing a<n>lot more fun.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: A racer and her trainer—the best of<n>partners! Here's to us!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: A racer and her trainer—the best of<n>partners! Here's to us!
